title._content: Fort Sumter, Showing the effects of the bombardment by the Artillery of the Army & Navy of the United States while occupied by the Rebels from April 1861 to Feb. 1865

description._content: Title: Fort Sumter, Showing the effects of the bombardment by the Artillery of the Army & Navy of the United States while occupied by the Rebels from April 1861 to Feb. 1865 Creator: Unknown Date: ca. 1865 Part Of: Collection of Civil War related prints and photographs Physical Description: 1 photographic print: albumen; 11 x 12 cm. on 16 x 23 cm. mount File: ag2007_0008_002_fortsumter_opt.jpg Rights: Please cite Southern Methodist University, Central University Libraries, DeGolyer Library when using this image file. A high-quality version of this file may be obtained for a fee by contacting degolyer@smu.edu.
